trans-unit.source: Encapsulates a <xref href="System.Drawing.Brush"></xref> object that fills the interior of a <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"></xref> object with a gradient.
trans-unit.target: Innkapsler en <xref href="System.Drawing.Brush"> </xref> objektet som fyller innsiden av en <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"> </xref> objekt med en gradering.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Denne klassen kan ikke arves.

trans-unit.source: The color gradient is a smooth shading of colors from the center point of the path to the outside boundary edge of the path.
trans-unit.target: Fargegradering er en smidig skyggen i farger fra senterpunktet i banen til den eksterne grense kanten for banen.

trans-unit.source: Blend factors, positions, and style affect where the gradient starts and ends, and how fast it changes shade.
trans-unit.target: Blandes faktorer, posisjonen og stil påvirke der graderingen starter og slutter, og hvor raskt skyggelegge endres.

trans-unit.source: Path gradient brushes do not obey the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.SmoothingMode%2A> property of the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object used to do the drawing.
trans-unit.target: Banen gradering pensler ikke overholde den <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.SmoothingMode%2A>-egenskapen til det <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>objektet brukes til å gjøre tegning.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.SmoothingMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: Areas filled using a PathGradientBrush object are rendered the same way (aliased) regardless of the smoothing mode.
trans-unit.target: Områder som er fylt med et PathGradientBrush objekt gjengis på samme måte uavhengig utjevningsmodusen (Alias).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PathGradientBrush"></xref> class with the specified path.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PathGradientBrush"> </xref> klassen med den angitte banen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"></xref> that defines the area filled by this <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PathGradientBrush"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"> </xref> som definerer området fylt av dette <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PathGradientBrush"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PathGradientBrush"></xref> class with the specified points.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PathGradientBrush"> </xref> klassen med de angitte punktene.

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> structures that represents the points that make up the vertices of the path.
trans-unit.target: En matrise av <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref> strukturer som representerer punktene som utgjør toppunkt i banen.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PathGradientBrush"></xref> class with the specified points.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PathGradientBrush"> </xref> klassen med de angitte punktene.

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref> structures that represents the points that make up the vertices of the path.
trans-unit.target: En matrise av <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"> </xref> strukturer som representerer punktene som utgjør toppunkt i banen.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PathGradientBrush"></xref> class with the specified points and wrap mode.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PathGradientBrush"> </xref> klasse med den angitte peker og bryte modus.

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> structures that represents the points that make up the vertices of the path.
trans-unit.target: En matrise av <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref> strukturer som representerer punktene som utgjør toppunkt i banen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.WrapMode"></xref> that specifies how fills drawn with this <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PathGradientBrush"></xref> are tiled.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.WrapMode"> </xref> som angir hvordan Fyll tegnes med denne <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PathGradientBrush"> </xref> er side ved side.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PathGradientBrush"></xref> class with the specified points and wrap mode.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PathGradientBrush"> </xref> klasse med den angitte peker og bryte modus.

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref> structures that represents the points that make up the vertices of the path.
trans-unit.target: En matrise av <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"> </xref> strukturer som representerer punktene som utgjør toppunkt i banen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.WrapMode"></xref> that specifies how fills drawn with this <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PathGradientBrush"></xref> are tiled.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.WrapMode"> </xref> som angir hvordan Fyll tegnes med denne <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PathGradientBrush"> </xref> er side ved side.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Blend"></xref> that specifies positions and factors that define a custom falloff for the gradient.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Blend"> </xref> som angir posisjonen og faktorer som definerer en egendefinert fall for graderingen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Blend> contains corresponding arrays of blend factors and positions.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Blend>inneholder tilsvarende matriser blanding faktorer og posisjonene.</xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Blend>

trans-unit.source: The blend factors specify the percentages of the starting color and ending color to use at the corresponding position.
trans-unit.target: Blanding faktorer angi prosentdeler Startfargen og slutt farge som skal brukes i den tilsvarende posisjonen.

trans-unit.source: The positions are given as a percentage of distance along the gradient path.
trans-unit.target: Posisjonen er angitt som en prosentdel av avstanden langs gradering banen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Blend"></xref> that represents a custom falloff for the gradient.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Blend"> </xref> som representerer en egendefinert fall for graderingen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the color at the center of the path gradient.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir fargen midt på banen gradering.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that represents the color at the center of the path gradient.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> som representerer fargene midt på banen gradering.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the center point of the path gradient.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir midtpunktet for banen gradering.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref> that represents the center point of the path gradient.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"> </xref> som representerer senterpunktet i banen gradering.

trans-unit.source: Creates an exact copy of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PathGradientBrush"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en nøyaktig kopi av denne <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PathGradientBrush"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PathGradientBrush"></xref> this method creates, cast as an object.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PathGradientBrush"> </xref> oppretter denne metoden som brukes som et objekt.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the focus point for the gradient falloff.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir fokus punkt for gradering fall.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref> that represents the focus point for the gradient falloff.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"> </xref> som representerer fokuspunktet for gradering fall.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ColorBlend"></xref> that defines a multicolor linear gradient.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ColorBlend"> </xref> som definerer flerfargede lineær gradering.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ColorBlend> contains corresponding arrays of colors and positions.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ColorBlend>inneholder tilsvarende matriser farger og posisjonene.</xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ColorBlend>

trans-unit.source: The positions are values from 0 through 1 that specify the percentage of the distance along the gradient path where the corresponding color is located.
trans-unit.target: Posisjonen er verdier mellom 0 og 1 som angir prosentdelen av avstanden langs gradering banen der den tilsvarende fargen finnes.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ColorBlend"></xref> that defines a multicolor linear gradient.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ColorBlend"> </xref> som definerer flerfargede lineær gradering.

trans-unit.source: Updates the brush's transformation matrix with the product of brush's transformation matrix multiplied by another matrix.
trans-unit.target: Oppdaterer den velgeren transformasjonen matrise med produktet av velgerens transformasjonen matrisen multiplisert med en annen matrise.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix"></xref> that will be multiplied by the brush's current transformation matrix.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix"> </xref> som multipliseres med den velgeren gjeldende transformasjonen matrise.

trans-unit.source: Updates the brush's transformation matrix with the product of the brush's transformation matrix multiplied by another matrix.
trans-unit.target: Oppdaterer den velgeren transformasjonen matrise med produktet av den velgeren transformasjonen matrisen multiplisert med en annen matrise.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix"></xref> that will be multiplied by the brush's current transformation matrix.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix"> </xref> som multipliseres med den velgeren gjeldende transformasjonen matrise.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.MatrixOrder"></xref> that specifies in which order to multiply the two matrices.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.MatrixOrder"> </xref> som angir hvilken for å multiplisere to matriser.

trans-unit.source: Gets a bounding rectangle for this <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PathGradientBrush"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter en avgrensende rektangelet for denne <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PathGradientBrush"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"></xref> that represents a rectangular region that bounds the path this <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PathGradientBrush"></xref> fills.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"> </xref> som representerer et rektangulært område som bounds banen dette <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PathGradientBrush"> </xref> fyller.

trans-unit.source: Resets the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PathGradientBrush.Transform*> property to identity.
trans-unit.target: Tilbakestiller det <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PathGradientBrush.Transform*>egenskapen identity.</xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PathGradientBrush.Transform*>

trans-unit.source: Rotates the local geometric transform by the specified amount.
trans-unit.target: Roterer lokale geometrisk transformeringen angitt.

trans-unit.source: This method prepends the rotation to the transform.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden setter inn roteringen til transformeringen.

trans-unit.source: The angle (extent) of rotation.
trans-unit.target: Rotasjonsvinkel (omfanget).

trans-unit.source: Rotates the local geometric transform by the specified amount in the specified order.
trans-unit.target: Roterer lokale geometrisk transformeringen hvor angitt i den angitte rekkefølgen.

trans-unit.source: The angle (extent) of rotation.
trans-unit.target: Rotasjonsvinkel (omfanget).

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.MatrixOrder"></xref> that specifies whether to append or prepend the rotation matrix.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.MatrixOrder"> </xref> som angir om du vil legge til eller prepend rotasjon matrisen.

trans-unit.source: Scales the local geometric transform by the specified amounts.
trans-unit.target: Skalaer lokale geometrisk transformeringen av beløpene som er angitt.

trans-unit.source: This method prepends the scaling matrix to the transform.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden setter inn skalering matrisen til transformeringen.

trans-unit.source: The transform scale factor in the x-axis direction.
trans-unit.target: Transformering skaleringsfaktoren i x-aksen retning.

trans-unit.source: The transform scale factor in the y-axis direction.
trans-unit.target: Transformering skaleringsfaktoren i y-aksen retning.

trans-unit.source: Scales the local geometric transform by the specified amounts in the specified order.
trans-unit.target: Skalaer lokale geometrisk transformeringen av beløpene som er angitt i den angitte rekkefølgen.

trans-unit.source: The transform scale factor in the x-axis direction.
trans-unit.target: Transformering skaleringsfaktoren i x-aksen retning.

trans-unit.source: The transform scale factor in the y-axis direction.
trans-unit.target: Transformering skaleringsfaktoren i y-aksen retning.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.MatrixOrder"></xref> that specifies whether to append or prepend the scaling matrix.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.MatrixOrder"> </xref> som angir om du vil legge til eller prepend skalering matrisen.

trans-unit.source: Creates a gradient with a center color and a linear falloff to one surrounding color.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en gradering med en center og lineære fall til én omkringliggende farge.

trans-unit.source: If there is more than one color in the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PathGradientBrush.SurroundColors%2A> array, the first color in the array is used for the ending color.
trans-unit.target: Hvis det finnes mer enn én farge i den <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PathGradientBrush.SurroundColors%2A>matrise, den første fargen i matrisen brukes for sluttfargen.</xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PathGradientBrush.SurroundColors%2A>

trans-unit.source: The colors specified in this array are used for discrete points on the brush's boundary path.
trans-unit.target: Farger som er angitt i denne matrisen som brukes for diskret punkt i banen for den velgeren grense.

trans-unit.source: A value from 0 through 1 that specifies where, along any radial from the center of the path to the path's boundary, the center color will be at its highest intensity.
trans-unit.target: En verdi mellom 0 og 1 som angir langs noen radiell fra midten av banen til banens grense blir der den midterste fargen på de høyeste intensiteten.

trans-unit.source: A value of 1 (the default) places the highest intensity at the center of the path.
trans-unit.target: Verdien 1 (standard), plasserer høyeste intensiteten i midten av banen.

trans-unit.source: Creates a gradient with a center color and a linear falloff to each surrounding color.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en gradering med en center og lineære fall til hver omkringliggende farge.

trans-unit.source: If there is more than one color in the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PathGradientBrush.SurroundColors%2A> array, the first color in the array is used for the ending color.
trans-unit.target: Hvis det finnes mer enn én farge i den <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PathGradientBrush.SurroundColors%2A>matrise, den første fargen i matrisen brukes for sluttfargen.</xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PathGradientBrush.SurroundColors%2A>

trans-unit.source: The colors specified in this array are colors used for discrete points on the brush's boundary path.
trans-unit.target: Farger som er angitt i denne matrisen er fargene som brukes for diskret punkt i banen for den velgeren grense.

trans-unit.source: By default, as you move from the boundary of a path gradient to the center point, the color changes gradually from the boundary color to the center color.
trans-unit.target: Som standard når du flytter fra grensen for banen gradering senterpunktet, endres fargen gradvis fra grense fargen senterfargen.

trans-unit.source: You can customize the positioning and blending of the boundary and center colors by calling this method.
trans-unit.target: Du kan tilpasse plasseringen og blanding av grense og center fargene ved å kalle denne metoden.

trans-unit.source: A value from 0 through 1 that specifies where, along any radial from the center of the path to the path's boundary, the center color will be at its highest intensity.
trans-unit.target: En verdi mellom 0 og 1 som angir langs noen radiell fra midten av banen til banens grense blir der den midterste fargen på de høyeste intensiteten.

trans-unit.source: A value of 1 (the default) places the highest intensity at the center of the path.
trans-unit.target: Verdien 1 (standard), plasserer høyeste intensiteten i midten av banen.

trans-unit.source: A value from 0 through 1 that specifies the maximum intensity of the center color that gets blended with the boundary color.
trans-unit.target: En verdi mellom 0 og 1 som angir maksimum intensiteten i center fargen som henter blandes med fargen grense.

trans-unit.source: A value of 1 causes the highest possible intensity of the center color, and it is the default value.
trans-unit.target: Verdien 1 fører til at høyeste mulige intensiteten i den midterste fargen, og den er standardverdien.

trans-unit.source: Creates a gradient brush that changes color starting from the center of the path outward to the path's boundary.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en gradering velgeren som endrer farge som starter fra midten av banen utover banens grense.

trans-unit.source: The transition from one color to another is based on a bell-shaped curve.
trans-unit.target: Bytte fra en farge til en annen er basert på en klokken-formet kurve.

trans-unit.source: If there is more than one color in the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PathGradientBrush.SurroundColors%2A> array, the first color in the array is used for the ending color.
trans-unit.target: Hvis det finnes mer enn én farge i den <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PathGradientBrush.SurroundColors%2A>matrise, den første fargen i matrisen brukes for sluttfargen.</xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PathGradientBrush.SurroundColors%2A>

trans-unit.source: The colors specified in this array are colors used for discrete points on the brush's boundary path.
trans-unit.target: Farger som er angitt i denne matrisen er fargene som brukes for diskret punkt i banen for den velgeren grense.

trans-unit.source: By default, as you move from the boundary of a path gradient to the center point, the color changes gradually from the boundary color to the center color.
trans-unit.target: Som standard når du flytter fra grensen for banen gradering senterpunktet, endres fargen gradvis fra grense fargen senterfargen.

trans-unit.source: You can customize the positioning and blending of the boundary and center colors by calling this method.
trans-unit.target: Du kan tilpasse plasseringen og blanding av grense og center fargene ved å kalle denne metoden.

trans-unit.source: A value from 0 through 1 that specifies where, along any radial from the center of the path to the path's boundary, the center color will be at its highest intensity.
trans-unit.target: En verdi mellom 0 og 1 som angir langs noen radiell fra midten av banen til banens grense blir der den midterste fargen på de høyeste intensiteten.

trans-unit.source: A value of 1 (the default) places the highest intensity at the center of the path.
trans-unit.target: Verdien 1 (standard), plasserer høyeste intensiteten i midten av banen.

trans-unit.source: Creates a gradient brush that changes color starting from the center of the path outward to the path's boundary.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en gradering velgeren som endrer farge som starter fra midten av banen utover banens grense.

trans-unit.source: The transition from one color to another is based on a bell-shaped curve.
trans-unit.target: Bytte fra en farge til en annen er basert på en klokken-formet kurve.

trans-unit.source: If there is more than one color in the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PathGradientBrush.SurroundColors%2A> array, the first color in the array is used for the ending color.
trans-unit.target: Hvis det finnes mer enn én farge i den <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PathGradientBrush.SurroundColors%2A>matrise, den første fargen i matrisen brukes for sluttfargen.</xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PathGradientBrush.SurroundColors%2A>

trans-unit.source: The colors specified in this array are colors used for discrete points on the brush's boundary path.
trans-unit.target: Farger som er angitt i denne matrisen er fargene som brukes for diskret punkt i banen for den velgeren grense.

trans-unit.source: By default, as you move from the boundary of a path gradient to the center point, the color changes gradually from the boundary color to the center color.
trans-unit.target: Som standard når du flytter fra grensen for banen gradering senterpunktet, endres fargen gradvis fra grense fargen senterfargen.

trans-unit.source: You can customize the positioning and blending of the boundary and center colors by calling this method.
trans-unit.target: Du kan tilpasse plasseringen og blanding av grense og center fargene ved å kalle denne metoden.

trans-unit.source: A value from 0 through 1 that specifies where, along any radial from the center of the path to the path's boundary, the center color will be at its highest intensity.
trans-unit.target: En verdi mellom 0 og 1 som angir langs noen radiell fra midten av banen til banens grense blir der den midterste fargen på de høyeste intensiteten.

trans-unit.source: A value of 1 (the default) places the highest intensity at the center of the path.
trans-unit.target: Verdien 1 (standard), plasserer høyeste intensiteten i midten av banen.

trans-unit.source: A value from 0 through 1 that specifies the maximum intensity of the center color that gets blended with the boundary color.
trans-unit.target: En verdi mellom 0 og 1 som angir maksimum intensiteten i center fargen som henter blandes med fargen grense.

trans-unit.source: A value of 1 causes the highest possible intensity of the center color, and it is the default value.
trans-unit.target: Verdien 1 fører til at høyeste mulige intensiteten i den midterste fargen, og den er standardverdien.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an array of colors that correspond to the points in the path this <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PathGradientBrush"></xref> fills.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en matrise av fargene som svarer til punktet i banen <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PathGradientBrush"> </xref> fyller.

trans-unit.source: Each <xref:System.Drawing.Color> in the SurroundColors array corresponds to a point in the path.
trans-unit.target: Hver <xref:System.Drawing.Color>av SurroundColors matrise samsvarer med et punkt i av banen.</xref:System.Drawing.Color>

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> structures that represents the colors associated with each point in the path this <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PathGradientBrush"></xref> fills.
trans-unit.target: En matrise av <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> strukturer som representerer fargene i hvert datapunkt i banen dette <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PathGradientBrush"> </xref> fyller.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a copy of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix"></xref> that defines a local geometric transform for this <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PathGradientBrush"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en kopi av det <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix"> </xref> som definerer en lokal geometrisk transformering for denne <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PathGradientBrush"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A geometric transform can be used to translate, scale, rotate, or skew the gradient fill.
trans-unit.target: En geometrisk transformering kan brukes til å oversette, skalere, rotere eller forskyve gradering fyll.

trans-unit.source: Because the matrix returned and by the Transform property is a copy of the brush's geometric transform, you should dispose of the matrix when you no longer need it.
trans-unit.target: Matrisen returnert av transformeringen egenskapen er en kopi av det velgeren geometrisk transformering og, og må du fjerne matrisen når du trenger det ikke lenger.

trans-unit.source: A copy of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix"></xref> that defines a geometric transform that applies only to fills drawn with this <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PathGradientBrush"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En kopi av det <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix"> </xref> som definerer en geometrisk transformering som bare gjelder for Fyll tegnes med denne <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PathGradientBrush"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Applies the specified translation to the local geometric transform.
trans-unit.target: Gjelder den angitte oversettelsen lokale geometrisk transformering.

trans-unit.source: This method prepends the translation to the transform.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden setter inn oversettelsen til transformeringen.

trans-unit.source: The value of the translation in x.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for oversettelsen i x.

trans-unit.source: The value of the translation in y.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for oversettelsen i y.

trans-unit.source: Applies the specified translation to the local geometric transform in the specified order.
trans-unit.target: Gjelder den angitte oversettelsen lokale geometrisk transformeringen i den angitte rekkefølgen.

trans-unit.source: The value of the translation in x.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for oversettelsen i x.

trans-unit.source: The value of the translation in y.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for oversettelsen i y.

trans-unit.source: The order (prepend or append) in which to apply the translation.
trans-unit.target: Rekkefølgen (prepend eller tilføye) som skal brukes oversettelsen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.WrapMode"></xref> that indicates the wrap mode for this <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PathGradientBrush"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.WrapMode"> </xref> som angir brytingsmodus for denne <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PathGradientBrush"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.WrapMode"></xref> that specifies how fills drawn with this <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PathGradientBrush"></xref> are tiled.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.WrapMode"> </xref> som angir hvordan Fyll tegnes med denne <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PathGradientBrush"> </xref> er side ved side.
